dataList.dlg: It's Faust. A genius with whom you're lucky to cross paths even once in your life.
I would always get up after three hours of sleep. I thought it was a natural phenomenon, but I later learned it wasn't the case for everyone.
Faust considers short periods of exposure to sunlight to be a useful activity.
Though I don't bother myself with hobbies, I once enjoyed stargazing.
...If you're the type of person who likes to summon others before considering what to say to them, I suggest using documents to communicate.
I'm considering adjusting my level of speech for different Sinners. Repeating myself twice or more can be rather inefficient.
Dante, I want you to understand that omniscience does not mean willing to answer your every question.
Brief deviations are within permitted range.
